name: Space Jammers
storyline: Play as an alien rock band of customizable kitten pirates. On their way to the galactic battle of the bands they get lost in space and across dimensions. Think the show “Sliders” if it featured musically inclined evolved kittens. Each level thrusts them into a new dimension with randomized rule-sets and procedurally generated bosses and weapons. Pick-up whatever you find and fight your way to the next exit in the hopes of reaching home. Fly starfighters, board space ships and loot locals to fund your music tour and become the rock gods of the galaxy.
summary:
Arcade + SHMUP + Bullet Time + Rogue-ish.
1-4 player co-op shooter where getting to the venue is the real adventure.
Retro Mashup of Gauntlet2 / Galaga / Battle Toads / Hotline Miami / Nuclear Throne and lots of geek-culture references.
Randomized gear, bosses, rules and missions.
Challenging, yet approachable for newcomers and quick for couch play.
